body_html: I'm sorry @mkalininait, I had no idea about that. then it looks like it was magically half-fixed at least 😂 (I think that not being able to remove the role was the more critical/annoying part of the bug, so it might not be an issue that needs an urgent fix after all if students can remove the empty roles themselves). Thanks for testing it again!
